trans-unit.source: Payment transaction type for processing electronic bank statements.

seg-source.mrk: Payment transaction type for processing electronic bank statements.

target.mrk: 電子銀行報告書を処理するための支払処理タイプ。

trans-unit.source: From the F4 help, you can select one of the payment transaction type that were defined in the configuration activity <uicontrol>Make Global Settings for Electronic Bank Statement</uicontrol>. The payment transaction type is used in the following scenarios:

seg-source.mrk: From the F4 help, you can select one of the payment transaction type that were defined in the configuration activity <uicontrol>Make Global Settings for Electronic Bank Statement</uicontrol>.
The payment transaction type is used in the following scenarios:

target.mrk: F4 ヘルプから、設定アクティビティ<uicontrol>設定: 電子銀行報告書共通設定</uicontrol>で定義された支払処理タイプの 1 つを選択できます。
支払処理タイプは、以下のシナリオで使用されます。

trans-unit.source: In combination with the <uicontrol>External Transaction</uicontrol> on the bank statement item, the posting rule is determined. In the case that no payment transaction type is specified for a house bank account, the SAP predelivered payment transaction type for the selected format is used during importing the bank statement using the <uicontrol>Manage Incoming Payment Files</uicontrol> app and the <xref keyref="loio6a32ad6153cf447caaceca09813f32f9"/> API.

seg-source.mrk: In combination with the <uicontrol>External Transaction</uicontrol> on the bank statement item, the posting rule is determined.

In the case that no payment transaction type is specified for a house bank account, the SAP predelivered payment transaction type for the selected format is used during importing the bank statement using the <uicontrol>Manage Incoming Payment Files</uicontrol> app and the <xref keyref="loio6a32ad6153cf447caaceca09813f32f9"/> API.

target.mrk: 銀行報告書明細の<uicontrol>外部取引</uicontrol>と組み合わせて、転記ルールが決定されます。
取引銀行口座の支払処理タイプが指定されていない場合、<uicontrol>入金ファイル管理</uicontrol>アプリおよび<xref keyref="loio6a32ad6153cf447caaceca09813f32f9"/>アプリを使用した銀行報告書のインポート時に、SAP が事前提供している選択済書式の支払処理タイプが使用されます。

trans-unit.source: Together with the bank service mapping in the <uicontrol>Manage Banks</uicontrol> app, it allows the system to identify the service volume for a certain bank service in end-of-day electronic bank statements. The volume is then used to validate the bank fees in the <uicontrol>Monitor Bank Fees</uicontrol> app.

seg-source.mrk: Together with the bank service mapping in the <uicontrol>Manage Banks</uicontrol> app, it allows the system to identify the service volume for a certain bank service in end-of-day electronic bank statements.
The volume is then used to validate the bank fees in the <uicontrol>Monitor Bank Fees</uicontrol> app.

target.mrk: <uicontrol>銀行管理</uicontrol>アプリの銀行サービスマッピングと合わせて、日締電子銀行報告書の特定の銀行サービスのサービスボリュームを特定することができます。
ボリュームは、<uicontrol>銀行手数料の監視</uicontrol>アプリで銀行手数料のチェックに使用されます。

trans-unit.source: Please note that for manual bank statements, the system uses the transaction type entered in the manual bank statement.

seg-source.mrk: Please note that for manual bank statements, the system uses the transaction type entered in the manual bank statement.

target.mrk: マニュアル銀行報告書では、マニュアル銀行報告書に入力された取引タイプが使用されることに注意してください。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <xref keyref="loiodec4bd6a027148ad8b8102bfaf578bbf">Validating Bank Services Charges</xref>.

seg-source.mrk: For more information, see <xref keyref="loiodec4bd6a027148ad8b8102bfaf578bbf">Validating Bank Services Charges</xref>.

target.mrk: 詳細については、<xref keyref="loiodec4bd6a027148ad8b8102bfaf578bbf">銀行サービス料のチェック</xref>を参照してください。
